title: How FaceTime on Apple TV will work - and more on other tvOS upgrades coming soon
description: Apple announced the new FaceTime for Apple TV feature and other tvOS updates during WWDC. We've gathered everything you can expect from these features this fall.

title: Google Pixel phones have a secret button. Here's how to find it (and use it)
description: A double-tap is all it takes to open your favorite apps, call on the Assistant, and more.

title: How generative AI is already changing the workplace: Oracle just added it to HR software
description: Generative AI-powered features will improve the job posting, search, and hiring processes for HR pros​ and job applicants alike, the company says.

title: How to protect your Thunderbird accounts with a primary password (and why you should)
description: If you don't want others having a peek into your Thunderbird email or using one or more of your email accounts against you, consider setting a primary password to protect that information.

title: How to create an auto-reply rule in Apple Mail (and why you should)
description: If you have certain emails that require an immediate response but you don't always have time to reply, Apple Mail has a handy trick that can help.

title: How to use Photoshop's Generative Fill AI tool to easily transform your boring photos
description: Join us for a step-by-step guide to using Adobe Photoshop's powerful AI tool to change a simple photograph into an exciting new scene.

title: AI arms race: This global index ranks which nations dominate AI development
description: In the wake of last year's generative AI surge, China still trails the US, while Singapore is coming up fast.

title: ChatGPT can now access the internet on mobile. Here's how
description: If you want to do some internet browsing via ChatGPT on mobile, now you can.

title: Nvidia sweeps AI benchmarks, but Intel brings meaningful competition
description: Intel is building a mutli-thousand-chip cluster internally based on its Gaudi AI accelerator, the company said, which could be even bigger competition for Nvidia down the road.

title: Apple is limiting Vision Pro's safety range for VR, and it's smaller than Meta Quests'
description: For fitness, gaming, and other high-movement applications, using the Vision Pro won't be as free rein as you'd wish.

title: These over-ear headphones sound like full-on speakers, and you can't beat the price
description: If high-quality audio is what you're after, the V-Moda Crossfade 3 can fill your ears with premium sound at an accessible price.

title: Buy an annual Costco membership and get a free $30 gift card
description: Save on electronics, gadgets, home appliances, groceries, home essentials, bulk goods and more at Costco. This deal lets you effectively get a membership for 50% off.

title: Samsung to open new 'playground' concept store aimed at Gen Z
description: The Samsung Gangnam store comes with an Instagrammable photo zone and is aimed to attract younger customers.
